Package.Description:
features:
- Default layout of masheene (THX!)

Package.Name: english
Package.Description: Ingame_Info_Tank_Info_Panel_protanki_2018-05-19.zip

Package.Name: Wide Border of Maps
Package.Description:
Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. 
WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map.
INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).
GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10.
EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.
COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card.
SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

Package.Name: Crew Skill Informer
Package.Description: Crew Skill Informer by Voytello and Dumadidak\nis WoT mod to visualize crews skills and perks meanwhile the battle. Activate it by pressing backspace

Package.Name: Gold Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
Package.Description:
Features
- Changes the color of hit effects
- Multiple colors choices available
- Works for all tanks in both teams
- Recolors penetrating hits, bouncing shots, ricochets, shots hitting the ground or other objects
- Does NOT recolor none penetrating hits or shots into water

This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

FAQ
Q: The Mod isn't working.
A: Make sure Extra Effects are enabled in the settings under Graphics.

Package.UpdateComment: Corrected writing error in the configuration file
Package.Description:
Combat efficiency calculator for World of Tanks.

Maud calculates the expected damage for each tank right during the battle.

The negative value of the damage shows how much you need to fill the damage so that its value is above average.

He considers the costs of silver spent in combat.

Package.Name: Spot Marks

Marks on the Ground for the best spotting positions.

Marker looks as follows:
Circle on the ground and the arrow on the circle to see a distance

Currently 24 Maps included, 19 Maps to do

Package.Name: Battle Observer (HP pools) v{version} By Armagomen (may conflict with xvm)
Package.UpdateComment: 2019-01-13: edited patch (the part for the main.json)\n2019-01-01: Updated, but author now has many new settings. If things look different in your garage, this mod is probably the cause.
Package.Description:
Shows the total HP of each team at the top of the screen.
High caliber config will show how much damage you need to get high caliber.
players info panel will show the hp of both teams when left alt is pressed.
Show spotted status will show in the players panel when an enemy is spotted. It might conflict with xvm.

Package.Name: Enable High Caliber Display (possible xvm conflict)
Show player spotted status in panels (possible xvm conflict)
Enable Players info panel (when you press left alt)
Show HP bars on players panel (possible xvm conflict)
Show shell travel time and aiming distance
